description: This table contains the basic information from Ryan White RSR abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CUR_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current state of the registry record


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Associated


Populated


In Progress


Edited


Validated


Needs Review


Ready for Export


Exported


Restored


Signed


Ready to Sign


Ready to Submit


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Done


Submit


Historical


Modified


Inactivated


Void


Saved to EQRS


Dialysis Intra-Facility Transfer


Investigating


Closed


Abstracting


Completed


Ready for Nurse Review


Ready for Physician Review


Waiting for Signoff


Care Planning Complete


Will Not Be Exported


Accepted with Warnings


A0410 Correction Requested


Wrong FAC_ID


Test Record


Corrected/Inactivated/Deleted


Abandoned


Admission Complete


Doc Complete


Filed

columns.name: RYN_WHT_REPORT_YEAR
columns.description: The Ryan White reporting year.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_REG_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unique provider registration code that is automatically generated when the provider is entered into the RSR Web system provider directory.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: RYN_WHT_UNIQUE_CLIENT_ID
columns.description: The encrypted, unique client identifier generated by the HAB Unique Client Identifier (UCI) generation utilities.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ENROLL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's enrollment status in the Ryan White program at the end of the reporting period. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active, continuing in program


Referred to another program or services, or self-sufficient


Removed from treatment due to violation of rules


Incarcerated


Relocated


Deceased

columns.name: RYN_WHT_BIRTH_YEAR
columns.description: The patient's year of birth.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ETHNICITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's ethnicity


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hispanic/Latino


Non-Hispanic/Latino

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SEX_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The biological sex assigned to the patient at birth. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Male


Female

columns.name: RYN_WHT_CURRENT_GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's current gender.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Male


Female


Transgender


Unknown


Transgender Male to Female


Transgender Female to Male


Transgender Other

columns.name: RYN_WHT_FPL_PERCENT
columns.description: The annual household income of the patient being reported to the Ryan White program.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HOUSING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient's housing status at the end of the reporting period. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Stable/permanent


Temporary


Unstable

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIVAIDSSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient's HIV/AIDS status at the end of the reporting period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


HIV negative


HIV positive, not AIDS


HIV positive, AIDS status unknown


CDC defined AIDS


HIV indeterminate (infants only)

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_DX_YEAR
columns.description: The year of the patient's HIV diagnosis.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_RISK_SCR_PROV_YN
columns.description:
Did the patient receive risk reduction screening/counseling during this reporting period? 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RYN_WHT_FIRST_AMB_DATE
columns.description: Date of patient's first ambulatory care date at this provider agency. This value must be on or before the last date of the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PRESC_PCP_PRLX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Was the patient prescribed PCP Prophylaxis anytime during this reporting period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes


Not medically indicated


No, client refused

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PRESC_ART_C_NAME
columns.description:
Was the patient prescribed Antiretroviral Therapy(ART) anytime during this reporting period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No, not ready (as determined by clinician)


No, client refused


No, intolerance, side-effect, toxicity


No, ART payment assistance unavailable


No, other reason


No

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_TB_C_NAME
columns.description:
Has the patient been screened for TB since his/her HIV diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes


Not medically indicated


Unknown

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_SYPHILIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Was the patient screened for syphilis during this reporting period? Exclude if under the age of 18 and not sexually active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes


Not medically indicated

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_HEP_B_C_NAME
columns.description:
Has the patient been screened for Hepatitis B since his/her HIV diagnosis?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_SCR_TB_C_NAME

columns.name: RYN_WHT_VACC_HEP_B_C_NAME
columns.description:
Has the patient completed the vaccine series for Hepatitis B? 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_SCR_SYPHILIS_C_NAME

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_HEP_C_C_NAME
columns.description:
Has the patient been screened for Hepatitis C since his/her HIV diagnosis?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_SCR_TB_C_NAME

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_SBST_ABUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Was the patient screened for substance abuse during the reporting period?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_SCR_SYPHILIS_C_NAME

columns.name: RYN_WHT_MENTAL_SCR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Was the patient screened for mental health during the reporting period?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_SCR_SYPHILIS_C_NAME

columns.name: RYN_WHT_RECV_PAP_SMEAR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Did the patient receive a cervical pap smear during the reporting period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes


Not medically indicated


Not applicable

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PREGNANT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Was the patient pregnant during the reporting period.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes


Not applicable

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_POS_DATE
columns.description: Date of patient's last confidential confirmatory HIV test with a positive result within the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_OAMC_LINK_DATE
columns.description: Date of patient's first Outpatient Ambulatory Medical Care (OAMC) visit after positive HIV test.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The unique provider organization identifier assigned through the Ryan White HIV/AIDS Program Data Report (RDR) or RSR Web application.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_VITAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the vital status of a Ryan White patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Deceased


Unknown


Alive

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HOUSING_DATE
columns.description: Holds date of collection of housing status for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RW_NEW_CLIENT_YN
columns.description:
Holds whether the patient is new to this provider.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_RISK_SCR_PROV_YN

columns.name: RW_SERV_PREV_YEAR_YN
columns.description:
Holds whether the patient received services in the previous year.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RYN_WHT_RISK_SCR_PROV_YN
